input.sentences: the home coming soccer game was in their honor .
the captain of the 1990 team spoke to the crowd .
cheer leaders performed before the game .
it was a cold night for a game .

output.sentences: The fellas and I met for our alumni soccer game over the weekend.
Bob gave a nice speech before the festivities kicked off.
Though it was colder than expected, the dance team gave a great performance.
Bob's daughter is the captain of the team, so they gave paid a little tribute to us old timers.
Overall it was a great day to sit in the stands with my friends and their families.
